body.name: ZESICA Women's Casual Striped Tops Short Sleeve Crew Neck Ribbed Knit T Shirts Comfy Loose Basic Pullover Sweater
features: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18. Stretchy knit top, please check the size chart before purchase!

Our fall knit top features a crew neck, short sleeves, classic striped pattern, button closure, ribbed knit, casual loose style. The fabric is soft, breathable, lightweight and cozy, must be an ideal gift for Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Anniversary.

The back keyhole button closure design adds a cute and playful touch to the overall design, easy to put on and take off. Perfect to pair with jeans, sknnies, leggings, skirts, dresses, can also be layered over cardigans, jackets, or coats for a chic and stylish look!

Slouchy pullover top is suitable for various occasions, casual, daily, lounge, office, school, city walk, vacation, picnic, shopping, beach, photography, evening gathering, etc. Always keep you comfortable and relaxed.
Machine wash with laundry bag recommended, hand wash in cold water, do not tumble dry, do not bleach, natural drying. Ironing after washing, make them more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and well made
reviews.reviewText: Fits as expected. Feels very soft! It was wrinkled from the packaging but I quickly steamed it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived quickly. Was extremely crushed when out of the bag, so I hung it up without inspecting to try to get out some of the wrinkles before washing. Went to try it on many days later, still unwashed, and noticed a stain and rinse mark at the neckline in front. Am very disappointed, however it is so soft that I am going to wash and treat it myself in the hope that I am able to remove the stain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This top has very nice details like the button closure at the back of the neck (which is more for aesthetic than function) and flattering half sleeves. It fits true to size based on the provided size guide. I’m very happy with this sweater and am looking forward to wearing it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute just wish it was an inch longer
reviews.reviewText: Very cute sweater. Well made, nice thickness. The blue stripe is beautiful. My only complaint is that I wish it was a bit longer to cover the mom pooch. However, I will still wear it, pooch and all. I also bought this in the beautiful black color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand if tops. Fits great and nice material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Stylish
reviews.reviewText: This shirt delivers on both style and comfort, making it a worthwhile addition to any casual wardrobe. The shirt fits as expected, offering a slightly loose design that aligns well with its laid-back, casual aesthetic. The ribbed knit fabric provides a comfortable feel, suitable for everyday wear, while the striped pattern adds a touch of classic style, making it versatile enough to pair with various bottoms. Its overall presentation strikes a nice balance between relaxed and chic, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a simple yet fashionable top. The appealing design and comfortable fit, ideal for casual outings or relaxed days at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really cute top for any season, under a blazer in cooler weather or alone in warmer weather.I got the blue and white stripe in XL and it fit perfectly. I am 5 ft and 160 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so impressed with this top! It’s comfortable, can be dressed up or down, and lays really nicely! Will be buying more colors for certain!
